mapper.select: select team_id, team_name, team_style, logo_image_path, best_image_path from team where team_id = #{teamId}
select player_id, name, back_number, position, file_name, file_size, file_bytes, mime_type from player where team_id = #{teamId} and position = #{position}

select name, height, weight, game_match, playing_time, goal, assist, yellow_card, red_card, mvp, rating, position, age, total_point, back_number, nationality, play_style, strength, weakness, file_name, file_size, file_bytes, mime_type from player where player_id = #{playerId}
